Author: kaytokeyos
Body: Guys already said it all  Commissions for use of capital will be paid out according to â€˜a smart-contractâ€™ upon closure of funded deal. E.g. a deal is being backed by 100â€™000 HANDs. Investorsâ€™ accrued commission for 3 months use of capital is 2%. Immediately upon closure of deal investors get their 100â€™000 HANDs plus 2â€™000 additional HANDs. Handelion will generate system commissions. A part of these commissions will be paid out according to a proportion of HDLTs held. E.g. Handelion has generated shareable commissions at the amount of 10â€™000 HANDs. An investor holds 7,63% of total HDLTs supplied. Therefore, the investor receives 7,63%*10â€™000 HANDS, or 763 additional HANDs immediately after a deal closure.
